entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.9Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Peters 10:00 AM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023
Temperature: 4.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 4.0°C
Wind: SE 32 km/h gust 58 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Showers beginning this morning and ending this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 13 except 8 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then showers. High 13 except 8 along parts of the coast. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
